summary: esteban cambiasso has won all the major european competitions a player can during his illustrious career but revealed that keeping leicester city in the premier league would be up there with the best . the foxes are currently seven points adrift at the bottom of the table , with only eight games remaining . cambiasso refuses to give up and admits keeping leicester up will feel like winning a trophy .

explain: Esteban Cambiasso, a former professional football player, believes that keeping Leicester City in the Premier League will be a significant achievement in his career.

A core idea of this aspect is that Leicester City, a football team, is currently in danger of being relegated from the Premier League due to being seven points behind safety with only eight games remaining in the season. Time is running out for them to save themselves and avoid being demoted to a lower division.

The aspect highlights Esteban Cambiasso's unwavering determination to keep Leicester City in the Premier League. Despite being seven points adrift at the bottom with only eight games remaining, Cambiasso refuses to give up and acknowledges that accomplishing such a feat would feel like winning a trophy. This emphasizes the magnitude and importance of the situation for Cambiasso and his team.

Esteban Cambiasso, a former professional footballer who played for various clubs like Real Madrid, Inter Milan, and Leicester City, says that keeping Leicester City in the Premier League will feel like winning a trophy. This means that he considers it a significant achievement and puts it on par with winning other major European competitions that he has won during his career.
Esteban Cambiasso equates the feeling of winning a trophy with the possibility of saving Leicester City from relegation.

One core idea of the given aspect is that Esteban Cambiasso has a successful career with an impressive track record of winning trophies. During his time at Inter Milan, the Argentinian midfielder won 15 trophies including five Serie A titles, three Coppa Italia titles, one Supercoppa Italiana title, one UEFA Champions League title, and one FIFA Club World Cup title. This shows that Cambiasso is a skilled and experienced player who is capable of helping teams achieve success on the field.

The aspect states that Esteban Cambiasso was also successful during his short spell in Spain. This implies that the former Real Madrid man was able to achieve great success and gain recognition even outside of his time with Inter Milan, where he won multiple Champions League titles.

The aspect states that Esteban Cambiasso, a professional football player, is enjoying his time in the East Midlands and could potentially extend his contract beyond the current one-year deal he has with his team, Leicester City. This indicates that he is happy with his experience playing for the club and might consider staying longer.
